definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: The ghost had scattered times, don't tear the double hanging river.
sentences.chinese: 零落殘魂倍黯然，雙垂別淚越江邊。

sentences.english: The spring term Qunfang jealousy, grind to dust scattered into the mud, only the fragrant as ever.
sentences.chinese: 春，一任羣芳妒，零落成泥碾作塵，只有香如故。

sentences.english: Sunlight splintered on the horizon as dusk settled into the hills.
sentences.chinese: 陽光零落地撒在天際，暮色爬上了山丘。

sentences.english: The passage in time, seem to exist in from torrentially get to scattered raindrop.
sentences.chinese: 時間的流逝，似乎只存在於從滂沱到零落的雨滴之中。

sentences.english: When the tree falls, the monkeys scatter.
sentences.chinese: 村莊零零落落地散佈在山腳下。

sentences.english: There were a few cows dotted around in the field.
sentences.chinese: 田野裏零零落落有幾頭牛。

sentences.english: There are scattered trees on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 山坡上零零落落長着些樹。

sentences.english: Do the flowers never drop on the dust in soft death in your garden?
sentences.chinese: 你園中的花朵從未在溫柔的死亡中零落塵埃嗎？

sentences.english: Daily Rixi buckle teeth 60 times each, can prevent dental teeth and tooth loss.
sentences.chinese: 每日日夕扣齒各60次，可健齒防牙病和牙齒零落等。

sentences.english: The data on these differences are patchy, the study’s authors acknowledge.
sentences.chinese: 該項研究的作者承認這些區別的數據是零落分散的。

sentences.english: Therefore, humans do not shed hair synchronously, as most animals do.
sentences.chinese: 因而，人類毛髮的零落不象植物那樣是同步的。

sentences.english: We see flowers here and there on the sides of the river.
sentences.chinese: 在小河邊，我們能看到一些零零落落的花。

definition: to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
to wither (and drop off)/to wilt/to pass away
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
variant of 飄零|飘零[piao1 ling2]
